issue.title: Add C++ build and test instructions in git repo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6483](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6483). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be helpful to have build and test instructions in the git repo itself. The "[Guide for C++ Developers](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/ARROW#)" on <https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/ARROW> links to nothing.
